storyInfo: Worried about Pramanix's situation and the siblings' relationships, Cliffheart convinces Courier to deliver a letter to Mount Karlan in her stead. Later, Courier returns from Kjerag with an unexpected invitation.

attributes.content: 6:50 A.M. \ Clear
Rhodes Island Landship, Operator Dorms
Mornin'!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Huh, the door's unlocked... Guess I'll let myself in.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Sup, Courier! Uncle Matterhorn! You guys in?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Huh, nobody's home?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: There's no way they'd be sleeping in this late... If they're not in their room, maybe they already left?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Darn it, I have to go find 'em!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hmm? Lady Ensia, what's going on so early in the morning... Wait, hold on, don't run in the hallway, it's too dangerous!
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Ah, there you are, bro!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Don't worry, nothing bad's gonna—— Woooah!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hey, watch out!
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Phew... Close one. Why's there a parcel here?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Thanks, bro.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Good grief, I told you to be careful. What am I going to do when you actually take a fall?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Hehe, I knew you were gonna catch me anyway.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hey... Lady Ensia, you're a fully-fledged operator now, you can't be so reckless...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: What's wrong, Courier? Did something happen?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Ah, Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Morning, Uncle!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ah, the Young Lady. Good morning.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Have you gotten used to life at Rhodes Island yet? It's rare to see you up so early though... Are you getting ready for a mission?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Or are you not used to the beds here? After all, I do recall you having very high standards for your sleep environment.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Back at the old house, Matterhorn helped pick out a bed for you when you were still very young, right? After that, you refused to sleep anywhere else.... and never without hugging your little blanket.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Mm, now that you remind me...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: W-Wait, hold your horses, Courier. Don't make stuff up, I wasn't that much of a princess!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Don't underestimate an adventurer either, got it? I've got no problem going early to bed, early to rise! If you can't get a good night's rest to replenish your energy when you're up in the mountains, there's no way you'll ever become a good mountaineer!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: No matter how cold it is, no matter how thin the air is, you bet I can fall right asleep!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Lady Ensia... You've grown up so much.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (mutters) Besides, I brought my blankie with me anyway. No way I wouldn't be able to fall asleep.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ah, so you ended up bringing it with you after all.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: You got a problem with that?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Alright, let's stop talking about this already!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Anyway, the fact that you two are headed out this early with these packages, are you going on a mission?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hmm, and with this amount of luggage, it's looking like a pretty long trip too... Heading back home?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That's right. We'll be getting ready to leave shortly.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Yup. We have to bring some stuff back over there. Master SilverAsh has quite a lot of things to deal with, and Matterhorn and I will be going back to help out.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Lady Ensia, is there anything you'd like us to take back to Master SilverAsh? Matterhorn and I would be more than glad to help.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Mm, I do have things I'd like to give to my brother, but... But, it's more than just that this time!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: What else...?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Well, um...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Darn it, c'mere real quick...!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Uncle Matterhorn, let's meet up at the cafeteria in a bit. I'm gonna go for a quick walk with Courier here! Oh, and tell my brother and Gnosis that I said hi!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: W-Wait, Lady Ensia, not so hard... You're going to pull down my clothes...!
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Lady Ensia...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Phew... Alright, this place should be fine.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Why are we avoiding Matterhorn? Is there something you can only tell me...?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: I guess there's a bit of that...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Courier, can you keep a secret for me?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm afraid that depends on the situation. If it's something dangerous, I might have to tell Master SilverAsh.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Ugh... Why do you have to be like that? Both you and Matterhorn are always taking my brother's side!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ahaha... Well, Master SilverAsh is also looking after you.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Hmph! Whatever, I'm gonna tell you anyway. It's not anything dangerous, so you'd better swear not to tell him anything!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Anyway, um, are you planning to head up to Mount Karlan, by any chance?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Not that I know, so far. It all depends on Master SilverAsh's arrangements. There's no saying whether Mister Gnosis and Lady Degenbrecher have plans of their own, either.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Why are you suddenly asking about this though? Is it related to Lady Enya again?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Mhm. I really can't keep anything from you.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Actually, I wrote a letter to my sister...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Back home, my brother controlled things too strictly, and I wasn't even able to sneak out to see her. I didn't even get to see her before I left for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: It's only gotten harder. I haven't seen Enya in the longest time!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Lady Ensia...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: So... Courier, would you be able to help me deliver this letter to Mount Karlan?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I just want to ask her how she's doing, and if it's hard being a Saintess. I also want to tell her that she doesn't have to worry about me... just stuff like that. I swear I didn't write anything outrageous!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: My brother couldn't care less about this, and he hasn't had a proper conversation with me in ages. As for Uncle Matterhorn, all he'd do is try to console me into waiting some more...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: So please! Courier, you're the only one I can count on!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm sorry... Lady Ensia.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: So... You can't do it after all?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: It's not that I don't want to, but... The situation in Kjerag has been complicated lately, and it's unlikely that the Vine-Bear Court will permit us any sort of contact with the Saintess.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Even if I wanted to deliver the letter, I'm afraid it would be hard for Lady Enya to receive it.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: I- I've never heard of this before! My brother hasn't told me anything about this...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Knowing too much isn't necessarily a good thing. The Master is looking out for you, and does not wish to burden you. Sending you to Rhodes Island was another way for him to protect you.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: He's always like that.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: He always keeps me in the dark, saying that he's doing this or that for our own good. In the end, my sister still left our home for Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Lady Enya had no choice...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Ugh... Fine, whatever! I guess we're done here!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Stop it with that dour expression already, bro. Since there's nothing you can do about it, just forget the thing about the letter!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Me being upset won't change anything, isn't that right?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Lady Ensia...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: But at least promise me, don't mention a single word of this to my brother, okay? He's gonna give me an earful for sure if he finds out, and my ears are gonna fall off if I have to sit through another one of his lectures!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: If Master SilverAsh heard your opinions of him, I'm sure he would be heartbroken.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: As if! He has more important things to attend to after all, hmph!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: In any case, I won't keep you any longer. I've gotta find Closure first and ask if the stuff I wanted came in... Hmm, but if I went down to see her this early, do you think she'd just shoo me out?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Judging by Closure's typical schedule, there's a good chance that she just fell asleep and won't be responding to any knocks on the door.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Good point. Maybe I'll wait 'til later then.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ah, that's right, remember to bring me back plenty of cystymilk curds and pulled meat. I can't buy them anywhere else, and I haven't had any for a long time!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Haha, don't you worry. Matterhorn has a long list already, including all of your favorite things. We won't miss any of that!
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Excellent! Well, good luck, and have a safe trip! Uncle Matterhorn must be sick and tired of waiting in the cafeteria, so hop to it!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: With your blessings, we will be back in no time.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Take care out there.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: (Waves)
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: *Sigh*... So, it's no good after all. Not all that unexpected, but I still can't help but feel a bit let down.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hmph. You're such an idiot, Enciodes. Even if you send Courier and Matterhorn to keep an eye on me, there's no way I'm gonna give up.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm not sure if Closure managed to get ahold of the cold-weather gear I'm going to need to scale those snowy mountains... Ugh, I can't wait, but when is Closure going to get out of bed?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Enya... Wait for me!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: The last of the wounded have been bandaged. What a relief, nobody was seriously injured.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: That's another mission complete! Next, we'll have to cross the woods and return along the border between Leithanien and Victoria.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ah, excuse me, but I won't be taking the same route back.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hm? Cliffheart, is there something else you need to do?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Yes. Just a little something I still have to take care of.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: But don't worry, it'll just be a little detour to take care of some personal matters. I won't be gone for long!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: It's fine, it's fine. I'll be acting on behalf of myself and nobody else, so I won't make any trouble for Rhodes Island... And, I'll talk to Dr. Kal'tsit myself after I get back!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That's not what I'm worried about though...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Well...... If you say so, Cliffheart. But make sure to stay safe, no matter what.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: No problem!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hmm? Courier!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Good day.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Yo. Haven't seen you around in a while. Did you just get back?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Mm. This time, there were quite a lot of things that needed to be done, and the whole process took longer than expected.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Matterhorn and that young lady, Cliffheart, were with you as well?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Matterhorn did come with me, but we did not bring the young lady along.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (Speaking of which, I haven't seen her since we came back...)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Oh? Sorry, I must've misunderstood something.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Not long ago, I saw the young lady packing a large bag of cold-weather mountaineering gear, and she was dressed for the job too. I assumed she was heading back with you.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Climbing gear... and specifically for snowy mountains? Are you... absolutely sure?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: No doubt about it. To tell you the truth, it's a hobby of mine as well. We talk about sweet deals on climbing gear a lot, which can save a whole bunch of money!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: If I'm remembering things right, your country's full of snowy mountains, right?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Oh, yes. Yes it is.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (Lady Ensia, surely you didn't...)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (...decide to climb up the mountains alone just to deliver Lady Enya a letter? Knowing Lady Ensia, that IS something she'd do...)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (That can't be it, can it?)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: If I get a chance, I'd like to take some time off and head over there myself. I've never tried climbing snowy mountains before, so I'll definitely be asking for advice from the locals when the time comes, heh.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: (Damn it... I can't get it out of my head!)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (I have to find out for myself... I should've known, there's no way Lady Ensia would have given up just like that!)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (If it really is true, I have to stop her!)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Pardon me, but I must get going!
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Huh? Wait, why are you running?
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Ah, sorry, but some urgent personal matters came up—
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Kjerag welcomes one and all! I promise I'll take you sightseeing when we get the chance!
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Take this road... and then head to the west...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ah! There it is!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That little snow-white summit... So that's what the peaks of Kjerag look like from a distance, huh?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Welp, can't really tell how hard that mountain is to climb from this distance. Might even say it looks kinda cute, that holy mountain of ours.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: But I know that's a really tough peak to summit. Those who haven't tried it themselves will never truly understand.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Like us Silverashes.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Outsiders could never understand...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: My, that's rather unfortunate. Do you see Matterhorn and myself as outsiders too, Lady Ensia?
Though it is true, hearing it does make my heart ache somewhat.
Finally, I've caught up.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Courier?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Thanks to your unfamiliarity with the terrain, you spent a lot of time taking this part of the route cautiously. Otherwise, I wouldn't have been able to catch you.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Wait, wh-why are you here, Courier?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I thought I—— Erm...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: It's too late to stay silent now. 'I thought I didn't tell anyone' is what you wanted to say, right?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Urgh...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: After realizing that I wouldn't help deliver the letter for you, you prepared all this cold-weather mountain-climbing gear and took on a mission that would put you closest to Kjerag.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: After finishing the mission, you'd let the rest of the team head back to Rhodes Island first and take a little detour to 'take care of some personal matters.'
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Such is my Lady Ensia, you certainly do act with great decisiveness.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: But, I still ended up getting caught...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: The fact that I saw so many hints but still failed to see through your plan makes me the stupid one.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Lady Ensia, are you planning to scale Mount Karlan again with only your bare hands?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Or, do you plan on barging into the Saintess's residence to deliver your letter, with no consideration for your own safety?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Have you considered what would happen if you made a fuss before the Vine-Bear Court?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Ever since I was little, every time I'd try to sneak out to play, you and my brother would always catch me. I never thought I'd be able to keep anything from you two.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You're exactly right. That is my plan. Since I faced down Mount Karlan once, I can do it a second time.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I can't allow it. It's too dangerous!
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: But if I'm powerless, what else am I to do?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm always powerless... Powerless to stop the rift between my brother and Enya from growing wider and wider. And I'm expected to just let it happen!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: On the day that Enya left home, I was hiding along the side. I knew she didn't want to go, and we both thought that big brother would protect us, but he didn't lift a finger... He didn't stop those people from taking Enya away.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I thought my sister would cry, but she didn't.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: When I saw her walk out that door, in my heart, I wished that she would've cried out.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Master SilverAsh... also suffers his own hardships.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: I know. Even though the two of you never tell me anything, I'm not stupid. I can see it.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ever since he came back from Victoria and founded that company, even you and Uncle Matterhorn have been getting busier. I understand.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I don't want to blame my brother. But, Courier, have you ever seen the Saintess of Kjerag?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Lady Enya? No, you mean, the 'Saintess.'
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Correct. The Kjerag Saintess.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I have, on one occasion. From a distance.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: At first, I was so excited to finally get a chance to see my big sister, but... the only thing I saw was the Saintess of Mount Karlan, standing there as if frozen in ice. From where I stood, there was nothing of my sister.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ever since then, I knew that Enya could not possibly have been living the life she wanted atop Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: We may have difficulty understanding each others' points of view from our current positions, but... I think Lady Enya is a different person now, you can't look at her like you did then.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: The Saintess is very important to Kjerag, and honestly, Lady Enya's situation may not be so bad. She stands to be the master of an entire religion, the very faith of Kjerag...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: That's not the same. Not at all.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You can say that the Saintess is noble, exalted, capable of being detached from our feelings. But our relationship is so much more important— we're literally sisters!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: As siblings, if we never try to understand each other, or even worse, end up becoming enemies one day, what are we going to do then?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I can't just wait until that day finally comes. I'm scared... so I have to do something.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Even if, even if it's something as simple as asking Enya how she's doing...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: And, what if it's not what you want to hear?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Then I'll just climb up that damned mountain. Lie, cheat, or steal if I must, I'll take her from that place!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm serious. I'm gonna do it!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Pfft. Hahaha.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Good grief, how can you make something like that sound so simple...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Hey, this is a symbol of my determination! Why are you making fun of me? That's uncalled for, man!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: The determination to lie, cheat, and steal, huh?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Uhhh... That's just a worst-case scenario.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That's true. I can only pray that the worst will never come to pass. Just thinking about you climbing up the mountain to kidnap her... Ughh, just thinking about it is giving me a headache.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Looks like you won't change your mind no matter what I say, right?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm not joking. If I say I'll do it, I'll do it!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Even if I insist on stopping you, or reporting this matter to Master SilverAsh—
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Even if my brother objects, even if he wants to lock me up, I won't give in. You'd better not underestimate me, because it's not that simple to shut me down!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: I guess that settles it then. You've always had that streak in you, you'll do whatever you set your mind to, and nobody can tell you otherwise. If even Master SilverAsh can't do anything about it, what can I do but surrender?
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hand that letter over to me.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: I'd rather not live with the constant worry of wondering when you're going to do something foolish. It's better for me to help you figure out a solution, not to mention safer too.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: *Sigh*... You're really putting me in a rough spot here, Lady Ensia.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: You're the best, bro!!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: If my brother is really opposed to it and somehow finds out and plans to punish you, just tell him that it was all my idea!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Haha, if only the Master was so easy to convince.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (whispers) But... this might not be such a bad thing either.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Huh? What'd you say?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Nothing in particular. Just thinking out loud.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: But let me say this in advance, even if I agreed to help, the most I can do is deliver the letter to the nearby monastery and then see if there's any way to get it up the mountain.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: That place is as close as we can get to the area controlled by the Vine-Bear Court. Any higher up into the mountain... and that is no longer a place you can come and go at will.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: I cannot guarantee that your letter will reach Lady Enya.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: No problem! The fact that you're willing to help means we at least have a shot... If it doesn't work, I'll just think up some other way!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I hope whatever you think up doesn't involve climbing up there.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Heehee!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: (Haha... By the looks of things, she really won't give up.)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: (If that day actually comes, Master SilverAsh is going to get the mother of all headaches...)
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: One more bowl!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Clo, I can't have another bite... I admit defeat.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Heh heh~ Who gave you the idea to compare your appetite to that of a hungry engineer who hasn't eaten in three days? I'm so hungry I could swallow a meatbeast whole!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: You locked yourself in your workshop again? What'cha working on this time?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Wait a sec, did nobody bring you food? How'd you starve for three days...? What about your little machines?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Eheh... I accidentally set the clearance level of my door to max, plus I was wearing my headphones so I couldn't hear the door at all.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: And it's not like I was doing it on purpose! All that fighting with Reunion broke a whole lot of equipment, and repairing everything was giving me a huge headache. Can't even do this job anymore without listening to some music.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: That explains it... Thankfully, Amiya went to fish you out today.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: All right, we done yet? I'm not here to listen to a sermon during mealtime!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: By the way, you're here to buy more climbing gear? How come I didn't see you use the cold-weather gear you bought half a year ago?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Ah, if there was a problem with the quality, just let me know. I'll go knock some... Er, I'll go bargain with the manufacturer.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: About that, umm, it's not that. There's nothing wrong with the gear, I just didn't need it for the time being.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'd be more worried if you ended up using it.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: That voice... Courier!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Good afternoon.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Oh, afternoon. Did you just get back from a mission? How come you're the only one here?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The others went to look for the Doctor first.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: As for me, I'm here to pass something on.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Enya... *cough* *cough* 'She' replied?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Awesome! Then let's make like last time and talk over there! Courier? Courier?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: What's going on with you...? You don't look so good. N-Nothing happened with Enya, right?! Or, did something happen to Enciodes—
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hey, don't panic, there's nothing of the sort...
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: Then, tell me what's going on!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Umm... the situation's a bit complicated. But in any case, Lady Ensia, there is one thing Master SilverAsh wanted you to pass on.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: He wants me to... pass on something?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Yes.
